content: as any cat knows getting cozy is more than a comfort it s a whole lifestyle for those of us who like to get cozy with a book inside cat is a comfy companion who will affirm and support our cherished moments of literary bliss her primary job is to snuggle up between pages but she also excels at snuggling up with readers inside cat was inspired by my first children s book * catside up catside down 1 * which was published in september 2023 the book demonstrates prepositions with photos of knitted cats in all different mostly cozy positions at 32 pages it s hardly a book that requires a bookmark but inside cat does not discriminate or judge what kind of book you stick her in plus with her long floppy body she can illustrate quite a few prepositions herself i designed inside cat to knit up with ease and minimal seaming you ll switch from i-cord to flat knitting to circular knitting to create the body and head then you ll attach i-cord limbs and triangle ears with just a few finishing stitches the embroidery for the face is so simple you could do it while balancing three cats in your lap if you could use a little guidance check out this youtube video 2 i made demonstrating all the key techniques used in the pattern 1 https //us macmillan com/books/9781250841261/catsideupcatsidedown 2 https //youtu be/wubjjmxhwr4 feature=shared
